div.p:
Summer tutoring for grades K-6 will be available June 2-July 30, 2020.
Registration is available now and is due May 4th. Please click the link for the ...

div.h3: Governor Closes Schools In South Dakota
div.p:
Governor Kristi Noem has closed schools in South Dakota for the remainder of the 19-20 school year. We will continue with our e-Learning format.
Students are...

div.p: Beginning tomorrow (April 1, 2020) The technology office will be open at the high school on Monday-Wednesday-Friday's from 8:30-10:00 AM each of those days....
